reviewText: I would catch episodes of Dog the Bounty Hunter off and on, on A&E.  Somehow recently I became hooked on it.  They are a hilarious family, bound by love for one another, and a love for the chase.  I laugh myself silly sometimes and regardless of seeing a rerun or a new episode, I can't get enough!  Highly recommend this to anyone.  Makes me want to give up my day job in collection level fashion to become a Bounty Hunter or Bailbondsman.
We were fans of the Dog, but are busy and do not always get to watch TV.  We throughly enjoyed it from start to finish and have gotten a few others "hooked" on DTBH as well.

I happened to see one episode of this show and I thought Chapman was an egotistical idiot. Later I found out that he himself is a convicted felon. Also, in case you missed it, he loves to use the N-word.

If you are  Dog  fan  you ought add this to you collection
  Good information
As usual the Dog delivers - Have to admit I am a big fan and was very happy with this purchase especially with the bonus material.

I am a loyal fan of Dog The Bounty Hunter and all the Family and Crew!!! I hate what A&E is doing to him, and hope they are paying dearly for it!! My Love and Best wishes to all for the Holidays and hoping 2008 will be a better and joyful time for us all!!!  Love,  MARJY OUTLAW
I just love anything about the DOG.  He is a person to be admired for changing his life so much and helping others the way he does.

I love DOG the Bounty Hunter so I was extremely pleased that the price was just right.  I snatched it up and now I am enjoying the DOG on DVD!!

This dvd is really good it shows you exactly what happened when the Dog, Leland and Tim got arrested trying to bring back serial rapist Andrew Luster to the states. It features commentary from all the family members expressing their emotinons and thoughts on what happened. I really enjoyed it because they are really honest and share the truth about what happened with their fans.

I'm a #1 Fan of Dog The Bounty Hunter and I'm looking forward to getting this on dvd. I Can't understand why Dog and the team got arrested because they finally got that Wacko in Mexico because he was hurting women and Dog and the team did a good thing from catching him and they got charged and arrested. I guess Mexico doesn't care about the laws that the U.S.A. has. I give Dog and the team a lot of credit for catching that lowlife from Mexico because that's where that wacko was hiding and they got him Thanks to Dog and the team. I'll be looking forward to getting this on dvd and see what the outcome is from the fans and there support.
